workflow:
Epic → Feature → Spec → Design → Tasks → Sync

1. /specid.epic (optional) - Create strategic initiatives (EPIC-NNN)
2. /specid.feature - Create features with user stories (FEAT-NNN)
3. /specid.prepare - Break features into specs (NNN-spec-name)
4. /specid.design - Create technical designs
5. /specid.tasks - Generate implementation tasks
6. /specid.sync - Sync status across documents
naming_conventions:
Epics: EPIC-001, EPIC-002 (padded 3 digits)
Features: FEAT-001, FEAT-002 (padded 3 digits)
Specs: 001-spec-name, 002-spec-name (padded 3 digits)
Requirements: FR-X (Functional), NFR-X (Non-Functional), AC-X (Acceptance), US-X (User Stories)
numbering_system:
Sequential, zero-padded to 3 digits
Format: [PREFIX]-[NUMBER]-[kebab-case-name]
Example: EPIC-001-user-management, FEAT-002-authentication, 003-login-page
status_values:
Draft → Ready → In Progress → Done / Blocked
Status flows bottom-up: Tasks → Specs → Features → Epics
requirement_types:
FR-X: Functional Requirements (what system does)
NFR-X: Non-Functional Requirements (quality attributes)
AC-X: Acceptance Criteria (testable conditions, EARS notation)
US-X: User Stories (from feature file)
